mapper.insert: insert into t_subject(name, subject_code, image, teacher_id, create_time) values (#{name}, #{subjectCode}, #{image}, #{teacherId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select * from t_subject where deleted = 1 and teacher_id = #{teacherId} and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
select us.subject_id as id, s.name as name from t_user_subject as us, t_subject as s where us.subject_id = s.id and us.user_id = #{id}
